Potężny Indeksowany Wyświetlacz Oknowy - koło naukowe MOS

About the project

since 2015 I have been an active member of the MOS (Microsystems Oriented Society) science club, where in 2017 I led one of the P.I.W.O. project shows during the "Ekonomalia" of the University of Economics in Wrocław. In addition, I took part in the development of the project, participated in shows, created animation and serviced existing hardware. Apart from the activity in the P.I.W.O. project, I am currently the leader of two projects: "Arcade Machine" and "S.N.A.K.E.", about which you can also read on the website. I also held internal workshops for the members of the science club about PCB design.
